meta.label: Elasticsearch index template
meta.description: Plugin customizing Elasticsearch mapping for a DSS dataset to avoid mapping conflict when an index template is configured in the target Elasticsearch cluster.
meta.author: admin

params.name: columns
params.label: Columns names
params.description: Optional. Comma-separated list of column names defined in Elasticsearch index template conflicting with DSS column mapping.

params.name: es-connections
params.label: Elasticsearch connections
params.description: Optional. Elasticsearch connections containing an Elasticsearch index template.

params.name: customMappingAllowed
params.label: Allow mapping customization
params.description: WARNING : Custom mapping will be overwritten at each schema change. Using an index template is the recommended way to configure field type mapping to ES types not implemented in DSS.
